data.text:
Sweet Sorrow

A Lyon health scare shakes up Empire, as Cookie holds down the fort, in spite of it all. Both Andre and Jamal try to right their wrongs, and Jamal makes a shocking revelation on live TV with Robin Roberts (guest-starring as herself). Eager to take Empire to new heights, Eddieâs motives are questioned when numbers donât add up. Meanwhile, Hakeem and Tiana find common ground and Becky reveals the secret sheâs been keeping from J. Poppa.

Tanks for the Memories

Mike is anxious to buy the miniature tank collection once belonging to the late husband of his neighbor, Helen Potts. But when he discovers Helen already sold the collection, he goes to extremes to make the collection his own. Meanwhile, Kristin and Ed are concerned when a mysterious âBubba Xâ posts a scathing review about their dining experience at the Outdoor Man Restaurant.
